description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, strategically located at the confluence of the Ganga, Gandak, and Burhi Gandak rivers. Operating under the Munger transport division, it handles crucial administrative functions including vehicle registrations and driving license issuance for seven administrative blocks. The office is vital for managing the transportation needs of a region heavily dependent on agricultural and river-based trade.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
